description:
While crossing an immense field of grass on the way to the three altars, our heroes run into a tough-talking opponent! Papi, completely fed up with how Hiro won`t summon him to battle anymore, sneaks away during the excitement. Can Hiro re-find his first friend, after taking him for granted?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ぷんすか! プンスカ! パピ!
